Hello there stranger..

Do u want to talk about it? How are u doing? Are u feeling ok? Are u feeling down? Are u feeling depressed?
this is what life is.. Some days you feel happy and positive and some days you feel down and upset.

I don’t know what your going through but I’m here for you, if your feeling down and depressed just remember that there are many people out there who love, care, and admire you.
Everything is gonna be ok.

Here, just relax, close your eyes, take a deep breath, now think about that one day that you enjoyed so much and is an unforgettable memory, take some time…… tell me what happened… How did that make you feel? Happy? haha it’s so nice seeing you smile:)

I’m sorry i have nothing else to say but your doing great, stay strong!

Hi What is your favourite song you made

Thank you for this beautiful piece of music!  My father just passed away about 3 weeks ago and I spent his last night on this mortal coil along with this playing softly in the the background.   My mom was snuggled up beside him as she had done thousands of times over the 60 years they were married.  As she slept beside him, her arm draped over his chest, he breathed his last with his best friend beside him.  It was the saddest thing I've ever experienced and it was the most beautiful thing I've ever experienced.  And even though he couldn't communicate, I know he heard this playing and he heard our gentle words letting him know it was ok to go.  Dad, you are missed, but we'll cross paths again!  Peace be with you....Michael
